body:
Pushing this out so @juturu can do a followup PR with these V8 resources:

> These help with debugging in gdb --
> https://github.com/v8/v8/wiki/GDB-JIT-Interface
> https://cs.chromium.org/chromium/src/v8/src/isolate.h?l=701
> https://cs.chromium.org/chromium/src/v8/tools/gdbinit
> 
> This has some info on tracing --
> https://github.com/v8/v8/wiki/Tracing-V8
> chrome://tracing can let you capture trace of Blink + V8. Click on
> Record -> Edit categories -> check all V8 options.
> 
> For info on profiling --
> https://github.com/v8/v8/wiki/V8-Profiler
> I personally use a combination of --prof, --trace-ic, --trace-opt,
> --trace-deopt, --print-bytecode, --print-opt-code to profile.
> 
> For docs on V8 internals --
> Interpreter --https://docs.google.com/document/d/11T2CRex9hXxoJwbYqVQ32yIPMh0uouUZLdyrtmMoL44/edit?ts=56f27d9d#heading=h.6jz9dj3bnr8t
> 
> Optimizing compiler --
> https://github.com/v8/v8/wiki/TurboFan
> 
> Thanks @gsathya for providing the links on v8!
